description: There are a lot of different ingredients in this drink, so it's no wonder that people think the name is strange. There's elderflower liqueur and Lillet Blanc mixed with lemon juice to give off an odd scent but surprisingly refreshing taste! It might be worth trying if you're looking for something herbal yet tangy-tasting as well.
name: Necromancer
recipeIngredient: 3/4 oz. Elderflower liqueur (such as Pür Likör Blossom)

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the absinthe, elderflower liqueur, Lillet Blanc, lemon juice, and dry gin into an ice-filled cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the absinthe, elderflower liqueur, Lillet Blanc, lemon juice, and dry gin into an ice-filled cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve and enjoy.
